overview: Girls grow up so fast. Only yesterday, these cock-crazed hotties were shy little angels in braces and pigtails. But now Daddy's little girl is a ripe 18-year-old woman, ready to indulge in action too hardcore for the pages of Barely Legal Magazine. Watch sassy teens re-create their very own coming-of-age stories on film. See their tight, young bodies do things so nasty, you won't believe it's their first time.
tagline: America's Favorite Legal Teens Finally Come On Video!
title: Barely Legal
